Name: Cyber Girls 2022
About the game: On year 2077, all mankind have become a cyborg. And you must fight all the gang leader on the cyber city. Are you ready to risk everything you have? Amongst the best beat’em up series ever created, cyborg girls beats and over the ninja street fighting, the iconic cyber world series comes back with a masterful fighters to and hype of the beat em up action fans simulator. FEATURES ● The comeback of the legendary Cyber Girls series. ● Beautiful 3D graphics made by Unity Engine new shader technique. ● Clean up Cyber City of zombies with your girlfriends! ● For the very first time, 4 cyborgs characters to take the streets! ● Casual hyper punk enhanced with brand-new mechanics. ● Soundtrack by a wide all-star line up of cyborg themed music. ● Unforgetable storyline.
